type_check.details: Compatible with TypeScript/JavaScript test infrastructure. Inputs: test files, npm commands. Outputs: passing tests, coverage metrics.

constraint_check.details: Maintains all invariants: TDD workflow, >80% coverage, <100ms unit tests, <5s integration tests, non-interactive execution. No architectural violations.

logic_check.details: Method to Outcome is logically sound: Test verification -> Failure analysis -> Reliability enhancement -> 100% pass rate. No contradictions. Global scope appropriate for system-wide reliability.

checks.notes: Strengthens existing testing invariants while improving reliability. Clear cause-effect chain from method to expected outcome.
